TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed PackageInstallVerification extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Enumerates values returned by several types and taken as a parameter of several types.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Android.Content.PM.PackageInstallVerification Allow = int32(1)

summary.para: Used as the verificationCode argument for to indicate that the calling package verifier allows the installation to proceed.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Android.Content.PM.PackageInstallVerification Reject = int32(-1)

summary.para: Used as the verificationCode argument for to indicate the calling package verifier does not vote to allow the installation to proceed.
